ingredients.ingredient: 2 (250 g) packages PHILADELPHIA Brick Cream Cheese, softened
3 (1 ounce) squares BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Baking Chocolate
1 cup thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping

cookingTips: Beat cream cheese until smooth to prevent lumps in filling
Use whole cookies as built-in crust for structured bases
Top with melted chocolate and whipped topping just before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user in combining Philadelphia cream cheese with chocolate topping for decadent individual cheesecakes.
